name: Tactical Schoolgirls
description:
This is a Tactical Stealth Spin-off Game of the main Game Schoolgirl Supervisor - Saori Sato - Wildlife.

Get armed and sneak up on your enemies and kill them silently. Explore 3 unique Maps with up to 30 different Levels.

You can choose between Katana, Sniper Rifle, Crossbow and your Fists.
Your bullets are limited so shoot wisely.

You have a FULL FREE customization opportunity, not just for you but also for your pussycat Sora!

Fight in team and destroy them all!

Your rank is determined if you can open the treasure chest without causing any alarm and if you managed to destroy all enemies.
